content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs School District takes great pride in its athletic programs for all grade levels. We believe that participation in sports enhances the scholastic experience, as students learn how to work together and the values of sportsmanship. 

2025-2026 Important Athletic Department Dates

Athletics Registration Through ArbiterSports

Saratoga Springs City School District offers the convenience of online registration through ArbiterSports, a secure registration platform that provides you with an easy, user-friendly way to register for our athletic programs. When you register through AribterSports, the system keeps track of your information in your AribterSports profile. You enter your information only once for each family member for multiple uses and multiple programs.

Athletic Schedules Through ScheduleGalaxy

For information on our athletic teams’ games and sporting events, please refer to our ScheduleGalaxy page.

Livestreaming Athletic Events

Watch the SSHS Athletics Hudl channel to view a livestream of athletic events. In addition to live games, you can also find an archive of games.

Sporting Event Admission Guidelines

Athletic events are a very important aspect of school life and provide a wholesome way to influence the positive growth and development of our students. Students in elementary and middle school must be accompanied by an adult.   Prior to attending an event, please view the Sporting Event Admissions Guidelines

Unified Sports

The Unified Sports Program is designed to provide sport training and competition for students with and without intellectual disabilities to play on the same team.  The goal of this program is to provide an opportunity for authentic competition for students of similar abilities to compete against participating schools and to help ensure that all students become involved in the social climate of the high school.
  • Fall BOCCE:  Colleen Belanger – c_belanger@saratogaschools.org
  • Winter Bowling: Jeff Harrington  –  j_harrington@saratogaschools.org
  • Spring Basketball: Kelsey Allen – k_allen@saratogaschools.org

Blue Streak Spirit Store

Visit our Blue Streak Spirit Store to purchase Blue Streak spirit wear and memorabilia.
